scripts.presnaps: npm run rename && mkdirp snaps/gallery && mkdirp snaps/thumbs && npm run snaps:placeholder
scripts.snaps: npm run snaps:gallery && npm run snaps:thumbs
scripts.postsnaps: npm run snaps:cleanup && npm run snaps:jsonlist
scripts.snaps:placeholder: magick convert -size "192x192" -colorspace Gray xc: +noise Random snaps/missingno.png
scripts.snaps:thumbs: magick mogrify -path snaps/thumbs -resize "192x192^" -gravity center -extent "192x192" -quality 90 -format jpg snaps/*.png
